100001.description: Responding to hypocrisy with hypocrisy, and responding to sincerity with sincerity—this is indeed what a Ninkyoumon who relishes in holding grudges would do.
100001.name: Clue No. 1

100002.description: Language is the appearance of appearances, an existence made possible through encryption.
100002.name: Clue No. 2

100003.description: Centuries ago, they say, the Deer God refused his place in the Great Temple and chose to live in the mountains. At the time, the mountain folk deeply respected the forest. They cut no more wood and hunted no more animals than were needed to provide sustenance. They lived in harmony with nature.
100003.name: Clue No. 3

100004.description: That spirit did not respect the forest. With a wave of its hand it felled ancient trees and slaughtered birds and beasts. It was a curse on the people and the mountain alike.
100004.name: Clue No. 4

100005.description: Warning! Please be warned again that there are large beasts in the mountains and that casualties have been reported. Residents are requested to refrain from hunting in the mountains for the time being!—Sasanami Security and Counter-Terrorism Unit
100005.name: Clue No. 5

200001.description: "With the world's best sword, I'll be able to protect everyone!"
200001.name: Card 1

200002.description: "Why is my thinking module missing? And why am I still able to think that my thinking module is missing?"
200002.name: Card 2

200004.description: It feels squishy. Is this... an attack?
200004.name: Card 4
